com.centurylink.mdw.event

Interface ExternalEventHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExternalEventHandler, ExternalEventHandlerBase, ExternalNotifyWaitingActivityEventHandler, FallbackEventHandler, InstanceLevelActionHandler, NotifySynchronousAdapterHandler, NotifyWaitingActivityEventHandler, ProcessStartEventHandler, RegressionTestEventHandler, ScheduledProcessStart

    public interface ExternalEventHandler
extends EventHandler
    The base External Event Handler that can be orchestrated The implementors of this handler will implement this

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Response handleEventMessage(Request msg, Object msgobj, Map<String,String> metainfo) 
      String handleEventMessage(String msg, Object msgobj, Map<String,String> metainfo)
      Handles the external event message The passed in message

    • Method Detail

      • handleEventMessage

        String handleEventMessage(String msg,
                          Object msgobj,
                          Map<String,String> metainfo)
                   throws EventHandlerException
        Handles the external event message The passed in message
        Parameters:
        msg - message from external system in string format
        msgobj - message from external system in parsed form, such as generic XML bean, JSON object. It is passed in as null if the message cannot be parsed or does not have an object representation (such as USO orders)
        metainfo - meta information around the request message, such as protocol, reply to address, request id, event name, event id, event instance id, arguments specified for handler, etc. See constants in Listener.java for typical ones
        Throws:
        EventHandlerException

      • handleEventMessage

        default Response handleEventMessage(Request msg,
                                    Object msgobj,
                                    Map<String,String> metainfo)
                             throws EventHandlerException
        Specified by:
        handleEventMessage in interface EventHandler
        Throws:
        EventHandlerException
